title: Hunter
description: As Cole Alexander prepares to make his way in the world, luck would have it, he meets the love of his life, Leila McLerran . Cole is diagnosed with a horrible disease that forces him to rethink the way that he wants his life to go. With death staring Cole in the face, he makes the decision that he doesn't want to live the rest of his days without Leila. As Cole and Leila plan for their future together, a vampire forever changes the course of their lives. Left a wreck of his former self, Cole meets Professor Job Fergusson , who steps in to tell him a Cole's disease gives him a slight edge over the undead and together they can dispose of the world's plight. Will Cole join the secret society of the Venatori and seek revenge, or is it all too much?
author: C.W. Nash
